--- title: "Practical Notes: Advances in Financtial Machine Learning Chapter 1-3" author: "Louis Becker" date: "2023-03-08" categories: [machine learning, code, python, finance, quant] image: "image.jpg" --- ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np import datetime import Labels import importlib importlib.reload(Labels) from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from ppym import pimdb ``` ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} db_engine = pimdb.create_engine_pim( driver='mysql+pymysql', host='pim-cpt-mysql-prod.prescient.local', port=3307, database='prime_eav', username='read.only', password='read.only' ) df = pimdb.get_series( ['SPX Index'], ['PX_last'], start_date=datetime.date(2003, 1, 1), end_date=datetime.date(2005, 1, 1), list_source_codes=['BB'], db_engine=db_engine ) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}
